website_summaries.verdict: Affordable rain cover that's compatible with and will fit tight on many different models of DSLR cameras.
pros: Allows you to keep shooting in the rain with a transparent window that fits perfectly over the lens glass
Has a Velcro strap so you can adjust the rain cover to fit tightly, no matter what size of lens you're using
Includes sleeves so you can access the dials and buttons without exposing the camera to water
cons: Can be a little awkward to use without some practice ahead of time

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, keeps the rain out.
customer_reviews.text: This cover was a necessity during a recent trip to Alaska. It folds up super small and easily fit my full framed DSLR and a 24-70mm Lens. I even had a 150-600mm lens with me that would fit in the cover as long as I didn't fully zoom out. The cover keep my equipment fully dry. The only complaint was given the cold temperature outside, my warm arm/hand in the cover caused a buildup of condensation in the cover and also fogged it up. I had to remove my hand a few times and try to wipe the inside of the cover with a small cloth I had with me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Howard

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this in anticipation of a rainy trip overseas ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in anticipation of a rainy trip overseas. Although I never actually had to use it, I can confirm that it's a bit larger for the smaller DSLRs (I have a Nikon D5500). While not impossible to use with them, it might be a bit awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Slynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover At A Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-made, easy to use and versatile product to fit both full frame and smaller DSLR cameras. Although I've had only two occasions to use this cover, I can say the camera itself remained dry while only the front filter of the lens received any moisture from a reasonably hard rain. So all in all, the cover does what it was intended to do and it appears it will be resilient through at least a few years of occasional use. Recommended and I will purchase again if ever required.
customer_reviews.author: CliftonClowers

customer_reviews.title: great product and customer service second to none
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work for my intended purpose but on a shorter lens it works fine. Customer service has proven to be head and shoulders above any other store I have communicated with. They stand behind their product and want the customer to be satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L.

customer_reviews.title: Works for any camera and so durable!
customer_reviews.text: This has been such a great thing u bought for my Canon 80D! I was able to take amazing photos in the rain and fog without any problem! Just gotta make sure you are blocking the lens with the cover (cause it does happen). Other than that I love this and recommend it to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Noonan

customer_reviews.title: It kept the snow off my camera while I was trying to photograph birds in a snow storm
customer_reviews.text: I'd read evaluations of this product on a photography website and on the basis of more serious photographers bought the cover. It works as advertised and was a good value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur David Digby

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works good. I've only ever used it once and it was sprinkling. I probably wouldn't use it if it was a downpour. But it's nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Sergent

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: The rain cover performed better than expected. I was at an outdoor event and when it started to rain the Venterior rain cover went on smooth and easy and saved the day as I was able to shoot all the photos I wanted. It was easy to install and kept my camera dry.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shafto

customer_reviews.title: It is too clumsy to be useful for outdoor photography
customer_reviews.text: It is too clumsy to be useful for outdoor photography. It obscures the lens and doesn't hold it's position on the camera.
customer_reviews.author: VAndyland

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: it did work, I mean its embarrassing having it but still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Ray K

customer_reviews.title: User error or just the wrong size for my camera
customer_reviews.text: Unclear on how to use this with a normal size camera. I have a Nikon D3300 and it was very difficult to use. I may have been using it wrong, but it was not very intuitive. It kept the camera dry but I could not take pictures with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works Well. Very helpful for outdoor photography in all weather. Keep with my camera gear at all times. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Lightweight materials make it easy to manipulate camera settings. Great product. Quick delivery. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda White

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but works when you use the strap
customer_reviews.text: kind of bulky when you don't use the strap around the hole where the camera lens comes out of.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Coplin

customer_reviews.title: would recommend an actual storm jacket but it worked for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Slides quite a bit, would recommend an actual storm jacket but it worked for a day.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was of excellent quality! It fit my Nikon D7000 perfectly! I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: JNK

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my daughter who takes lots of photos at sports events. She was very happy with the quality and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean K

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the rain forest worked like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sandoz

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. As advertised, keeps the rain from the camera, you can use two hands or one, clear view through the transparent back side.
customer_reviews.author: Slava Zheltonogov

customer_reviews.title: Took this cover on my Alaska cruise. The day ...
customer_reviews.text: Took this cover on my Alaska cruise. The day we were out where the Humpback whales were it was raining. Thanks to the cover I got a whale tail shot. Others on the ship wished they had a cover. Jeanette
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Lonas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put on but easy to pack up!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: Had a wedding I was shooting in Jamaica and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a wedding I was shooting in Jamaica and it rained during the rehearsal dinner. This kept my camera and dry. Saved me a lot of issues!
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Reinholt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks very good but have not use it to date. Sorry I can’t be better help.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Ferchow

product_meta.title: Venterior Waterproof Rain Cover Camera Protector for Canon Nikon Pentax and Other DSLR Cameras - Protect from Rain Snow Dust Sand
product_meta.description:
Professional Rain Cover for Your DSLR Cameras - Compatible with most camera and lens (Max 7.8" lens), better for medium and large DSLR cameras.

Features
✔High quality waterproof nylon and transparent TPU window help to protect your camera from rain, snow, salt spray, dust, sand and any other unexpected weather conditions.
✔Interior adjustable velcro strap allows you to adjust the length of nylon sleeve (lens part) to fit your camera lens.
✔Adjustable circle velcro strap helps to hold the nylon sleeve (lens part) in place.
✔Clear viewing window, adjustable sleeves and double zipper, provide access to camera control when holding or tripod mounting your camera.
✔Double zipper allows you to put the rain cover on the camera easily.
✔Lens Sleeve Length: 7.8in/20cm

Package Includes
1 X Rain Cover
1 X Free Cleaning Cloth (ordinary wiping cloth, not for DSLR Lens)

Compatibility
Canon, Nikon, Sony, Pentax, and Other DSLR Camera, such as Canon Rebel T5i T4i T3i T3 T2i T1i XS XSi XT XTi SL1 EOS 350D 400D 450D 500D 550D 600D 650D 700D 1000D 1100D 70D 60D 7D 6D 5D, Nikon D7100 D7000 D5200 D5100 D5000 D3200 D3100 D3000 D90 D80 and more.

Notice
1. It would be better to use a lens hood together with the rain cover.
2. Before using the rain cover to protect camera, please check whether the product has damaged parts.
3. Camera and Tripod are NOT included.
feature_bullets: Protect your DSLR camera and lens from rain, snow, salt spray, dust, sand and any other unexpected weather conditions.
Clear viewing window, adjustable sleeves and double zipper, provide access to camera control when holding or mounting your camera.
Materials: high quality waterproof nylon and clear viewing (transparent) TPU window. The rain coat/cover can be folded up.
The interior adjustable velcro strap allows you to adjust the lens sleeve to fit your camera lens.

Compatibility: Canon, Nikon, Sony, Pentax, and Other DSLR Camera, such as Canon Rebel T5i T4i T3i T3 T2i T1i XS XSi XT XTi SL1 EOS 350D 400D 450D 500D 550D 600D 650D 700D 1000D 1100D 70D 60D 7D 6D 5D, Nikon D7100 D7000 D5200 D5100 D5000 D3200 D3100 D3000 D90 D80 and more.
